app_name: Groups Control Groups Voice Recording and Karaoke Apps Transcriber Speech to Text
app_description: Transcriber Speech to Text helps you transcribe voice memos into text. Based on artificial intelligence technologies Transcriber provides you with quality transcriptions and an easy to use app. It has a perfect recognition rate and can work in any environment even noisy ones. This means you can transcribe interviews lectures and more without having to worry about background noise. Transcriber can help you: Create meeting logs. Create transcripts of classes. Record the text version of your important conversations. Transcriber is your reliable personal assistant. It is ready to transcribe your meetings and interviews anytime. TOP FEATURES: Transcribe any voice memo with high quality. Export text of your transcriptions as .pdf .txt .docx or .srt. Easy to replay and modify your transcriptions. High level privacy protection it only stores your transcriptions and voice memos on your local device. 100 ad free. Transcriber is the best voice typing tool that can transcribe your audio to text. You can speak in your own language and Transcriber will convert to text automatically. It is a must have transcription tool for medical transcription business lawyers and more. FREE TRIAL Download Transcriber Speech to Text to get your free trial. Save time on your transcription jobs. Transcriber Premium is a premium subscription that allows you to use advanced features of the app. If you choose to get Transcriber Premium then the payment will be charged to your Apple ID account once you confirm your purchase. The subscription automatically renews unless it is canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can manage and cancel your subscriptions through the App Store account settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period if offered will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to the publication where applicable.
